text: Shout out to <@U22PWJ41G> - Chris is the perfect example of why I love HubSpot, he has helped me numerous times over the past 5ish years developing on HubSpot (even with Outlook email templates!) and he always goes above and beyond. I'm sure that anyone else that has had the pleasure of working with Chris knows how awesome he is but I wanted to make a shoutout post just for him :slightly_smiling_face: :clap: :star:
